s.text: The American Inns of Court is a national legal association composed of more than 24,000 federal, state and local judges, lawyers, law professors and law students.
"The award says a lot about the legal profession, that it places such a high honor on pro bono service," she said, adding that it also says a lot about the Delaware Bar, which nominated her.
In 2001, Delaware Volunteer Legal Services helped more than 1,000 low-income defendants.
